nodes.text: Var'soonta was a male Twi'lek who sold salvage to Evocii on Nal Hutta during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. He ran his business, Var'soonta's Many Treasures, out of the settlement of Voam near Jiguuna, assisted by an Evocii native, Imot. After Imot spoke up to a visitor about a hunter who was slaughtering his people, that Imperial-aligned individual was further informed of the situation by Var'soonta, and agreed to help.
